item.title: Foot Sling Plantar Fasciitis Nonskid Pad On Bottom Of Splint & Universal Size Fits Left Or Right
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The AT 388 LACE ANKLE SUPPORT has been designed and manufactured by AT Surgical specifically to treat and provide rapid relief to weak ankles and…

The post Foot Sling Plantar Fasciitis Nonskid Pad On Bottom Of Splint & Universal Size Fits Left Or Right appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The AT 388 LACE ANKLE SUPPORT has been designed and manufactured by AT Surgical specifically to treat and provide rapid relief to weak ankles and sprained ankles.
The Lace ankle support is perfect fit for use while playing basketball, running, soccer, volleyball ,football or any other sport. It is also ideal for post sports related injuries.

This ankle support product has plenty of lace to fit all sizes . This is the most stable and adjustable one, offering the best coverage ,also makes it the most comfortable, whether wearing it with shoes or not .

It locks your foot into position so you can walk without fear of further injury .

Features:

  • FIGURE 8 STRAP DESIGN: LACE ANKLE SUPPORT not only lace up nice and tight but the figure 8 strap design really stabilizes from rolling .
  • DISTINCTIVE DESIGN : Designed as a canvas construction by the professionals of AT Surgical.
  • DURABLE : To ensure it is durable, yet comfortable, providing stronger full around the ankle support and stability.
  • FULLY ADJUSTABLE :There is plenty of lace in order to fit all sizes .
  • STRONG LACES: The laces are strong enough to support for ultimate compression.
  • BILATERAL FIT: Our dynamic ankle supports are bilateral, meaning they can fit both your left and right foot.
  • Superior Quality : The product is MADE IN AMERICA, consulting professionals by AT Surgical, which means it ensures and abides by the supreme quality fit for patientsâ€™ rapid pain relief.

    • Specification:

  • Item Type: Ankle Brace
  • Style: LACE Ankle Brace
  • Gender: Men/Women

    • Size

  • Sizes Available
  • (1 ) One SIZE Fits All
  • (2) Fits BOTH, LEFT or RIGHT Foot

    • The post Foot Sling Plantar Fasciitis Nonskid Pad On Bottom Of Splint & Universal Size Fits Left Or Right appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Bernie Pouch With Cold Or Hot Wrap Gel Pack : Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee, Leg, Foot & Ankle Pain Relief
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK is an essential product in your First-Aid box for your home. Just fill up with Hot or Cold Gel…

The post Bernie Pouch With Cold Or Hot Wrap Gel Pack : Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee, Leg, Foot & Ankle Pain Relief appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK is an essential product in your First-Aid box for your home.
Just fill up with Hot or Cold Gel Packs to get relief from sports injuries, swelling, muscle pains, post surgery, recovery after knee replacement, arthritis treatment, Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee,Leg,Foot & Ankle joint pain relief and more!

Features:

  • Universal use : The AT Bernie Pouch can be used universally for all your body pain relief for example on shoulder, arm, back, knee and leg.
  • Accommodates both Hot and Cold Gel Packs- The bernie pouch can be used both for Cold and Hot Gel Packs. So it lets you use it as an ice pack or heating pad. The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK comes with a HOT/COLD pack according to your choice.
  • Reusable – The Bernie Pouch is reusable. Fill up the bernie pouch with Hot or Cold Gel Packs as desired, use it for your Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee,Leg.Foot & Ankle joint pain relief. The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK comes with a HOT/COLD pack according to your choice.After use, dispose off the Hot or Cold Gel Pack, wash the Bernie Pouch and reuse by refilling new HOT/COLD pack; as simple as that ; thus it is both washable & economical.
  • One Size Fits All: The Bernie Pouch is unlike other cheap leg or foot wraps that are too tight. Cheap leg/feet wraps make it discomfortable for your feet and ankles whereas The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK is a one size fits all product that allows you to enjoy the perfect support while treating your aching feet, shoulders, arms, back, knees, ankle, you name it !
  • COOL OR HEAT RELIEF FOR ACHING FEET AND ANKLES: The Bernie Pouch gives you the choice to either use Cold/Hot Gel Packs, providing you the choice of therapy that best suits your needs and treat Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee,Leg,Foot & Ankle joint soreness effectively. The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK comes with a HOT/COLD pack according to your choice.
  • Easy to Use :This easy to use Bernie Pouch is ideal to relieve pain caused by injuries, sprains, arthritis and more! Fill up the Bernie Pouch with Hot or Cold gels and simply put your foot into it and enjoy the comfort, allowing the hot or cold gel packs to relieve any existing pain.

Size

  • Size Available
  • One Size Fits All

    • The post Bernie Pouch With Cold Or Hot Wrap Gel Pack : Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee, Leg, Foot & Ankle Pain Relief appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Swimmer Support Suspensory with Optional Draw String
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
This light weight, thin strapped suspensory is made from a softer fabric that makes it durable while practically invisible under swim shorts. Draw strings make the suspensory adjustable for maximum functionality and comfort.

The post Swimmer Support Suspensory with Optional Draw String appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Swimmer Support Suspensory with Optional Draw String appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Scrotal Suspensory
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Made with a solid white waistband and a soft, comfortable knit cotton/rayon breathable mesh support pouch with room to stretch, this suspensory scrotal support has a generous elasticized hole in front that fits most men. Your scrotum & testicles will be comfortably secured and lifted, while the waistband is adjustable for your specific level of support. Inconspicuous under clothing and machine washable. One size fits most.

The post Scrotal Suspensory appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
For custom sizing call us at (800) 225-2023

The post Scrotal Suspensory appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: AT Surgical Athletic Supporter
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
A-T Supporters are designed to protect, lift, and hold the testes against the body. This prevents strain on the cords and muscles during activity, helping…

The post AT Surgical Athletic Supporter appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• A-T Supporters are designed to protect, lift, and hold the testes against the body. This prevents strain on the cords and muscles during activity, helping to eliminate discomfort and keeping them away from injury.
  • Waistband- 3″ woven cotton/elastic mix for comfort. retain elasticity. Minimize curling at the top/bottom.
  • Leg Straps- Non-roll tubular elastic helps prevent binding, wrinkling or rolling.
  • Pouch- Soft, comfortable cotton-rayon gives you complete support.

 

Size

Small 26″-32″

Medium 32″-38″

Large 38″-44″

X-Large 44″-48″

The post AT Surgical Athletic Supporter appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Cradle Arm Sling Shoulder Immobilizer with Foam Swathe
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Made with a 1" wide adjustable strap and Velcro closures. The Cradle Arm Sling Shoulder Immobilizer with Foam Swath helps distribute weight to the shoulder and back and provides relief and protection while you're recuperating and healing from an arm or hand fracture, sprain or surgery

The post Cradle Arm Sling Shoulder Immobilizer with Foam Swathe appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• The Cradle Arm Sling Shoulder Immobilizer with Foam Swath provides relief and protection while you’re recuperating and healing from an arm or hand fracture, sprain or surgery
  • Made with a 1″ wide adjustable strap and Velcro closures
  • The Cradle Arm Sling Shoulder Immobilizer with Foam Swath helps distribute weight to the shoulder and back
  • Reversible for the right or left arm
  • Shoulder immobilizer with foam swathe prevents further injury during recuperation
  • One size – adjustable

The post Cradle Arm Sling Shoulder Immobilizer with Foam Swathe appeared first on AT Surgical.
